name: Roxanne Sanchez
coverLetter: I had a boyfriend who used to grow. I  would help him trim his branches. After about 8 months or so depending on size, we would trim the branches. Removing large fan leaves with my hands. Then, we'd trim the little sugar leaves as much as possible to get the closest purest bud possible. You don't want any harsh taste for the customers. Finally, leave the branches hanging upside down in a cool dark room.
